St._Charles.J. Scheidegger Center for the Arts: J. Scheidegger Center for the Arts was opened in 2008 in St. Charles, Missouri, United States, on the campus of the Lindenwood University as a state-of-the-art $32 million, 138,000-square-foot (12,800 m2) educational and performing arts complex. The facility is named after a $2 million donation from Jerry Scheidegger, Lindenwood board member, St.
